goal: Add schema transformer for ElevenLabs conversation exports to webhook format

fields.what: Transform ElevenLabs conversation export schema to match post-call webhook trigger format
fields.why: Enable reprocessing of historical conversations through existing post-call webhook pipeline
fields.how: Add transformation node to ElevenLabs Conversation Export workflow (5CmDvqF0GloEr7be)
fields.which: ElevenLabs Conversation Export workflow, post-call webhook consumers
fields.lest: Historical calls cannot be reprocessed, data migration blocked, audit trail unavailable
fields.measuredBy: Transformed output matches webhook schema, downstream workflows accept reprocessed calls

summary: Add schema transformer for ElevenLabs conversation exports to webhook format
